```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(p8105.datasets)

library(plotly)
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
data(instacart) 

instacart =  
  sample_n(instacart, 20000) %>% 
  mutate(
    order_dow = recode(
      order_dow,
      '0' = "Sunday",
      '1' = "Monday",
      '2' = "Tuesday",
      '3' = "Wednesday",
      '4' = "Thursday",
      '5' = "Friday",
      '6' = "Saturday"
    )
  )
```

Column {data-width=600}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Barchart of Total Number of Items from Each Aisle by Week Day

```{r}
instacart %>% 
  group_by(aisle, order_dow) %>% 
  summarise(total = n()) %>% 
  filter(total >100) %>% 
  plot_ly(y = ~total, x= ~aisle, type = "bar",color = ~order_dow)
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Boxplot of the Distibutions of Orders Hours of the Day by each Deparment

```{r}
instacart %>% 
  plot_ly( y = ~order_hour_of_day, color = ~department, type = "box") 
```





### Line Graph of 75 or More Total Number of Products 

```{r}
instacart %>% 
  group_by(product_name) %>% 
  summarise(count = n()) %>% 
  filter(count >= 75) %>% 
  plot_ly(y = ~count, x = ~product_name, type = "scatter", 
          mode= "markers+lines",
          color = I("green"))
 
```
